Plot: An aspiring actress makes a pact with her fiancé to take a job as an exotic dancer to care for her cancer stricken father. Once the pact the couple made is broken, their lives are changed forever. Based on the true story of director Greg Carter and his girlfriend prior to their moving to Los Angeles in 2005.
Title: Lap Dance
Actors: Briana Evigan, Stacey Dash, Carmen Electra, James Remar
